alert.note: Alert for Alcona; Alpena; Crawford; Iosco; Missaukee; Montmorency; Ogemaw; Oscoda; Roscommon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 2:59PM EDT until April 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning this afternoon and evening... .DISCUSSION...Temperatures will warm through the 70s and into the lower 80s today, along with critical relative humidity values and west to southwest winds gusting to 30 mph. This will result in dangerous fire weather conditions this afternoon and early evening across part of north central and northeast lower Michigan. ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHERN LOWER MICHIGAN... * TIMING...Starting late this morning and continuing 800 pm. * WINDS...West to southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 to 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...76 to 83 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Alcona; Alpena; Crawford; Iosco; Missaukee; Montmorency; Ogemaw; Oscoda; Roscommon
